document.full_text: british musician pete doherty, best known as a member of babyshambles and the libertines, was warned by a judge on friday that he could face time in prison for repeated drug offences.
document.title: uk singer pete doherty given jail warning
lines_and_colors: british musician pete doherty, best known as a member of babyshambles and the libertines, was warned by a judge on friday that he could face time in prison for repeated drug offences.
